Data Science Intern at Mobile Premier League (MPL)

May 2025 - August 2025

Built an XGBoost-based referral model that improved recall and boosted user engagement through referrals.

Managed a real-time pipeline for 7M users daily, publishing referral triggers to Kafka.

Designed and ran A/B tests on large user bases (500K+), using methods like stratified sampling to test retention strategies.

Software Intern (AI) at a Pre-seed startup

December 2024 - March 2025
Worked on a cross teams collaboration and observability platform for agentic frameworks. Helped the team apply for YC Spring 2025. Spearheaded development of the core python module.

86400 (Previously Mobileware Technologies)

May 2024 - July 2024.
Developed a production-ready RAG-based conversational agent for real-time query resolution of NPCI circulars and company documents, improving information accessibility. Multiple LLMs (Llama & Mistral) were evaluated and benchmarked on AWS Bedrock for optimal information retrieval and response.
